Jx.Dialog.Prompt

Extends: Jx.Dialog

Jx.Dialog.Prompt is an extension of Jx.Dialog that allows the developer to display a message to the user and ask for a text response.

MooTools.lang Keys

  • prompt.okButton
  • prompt.cancelButton
